alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:51PM CDT until June 22 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Empire to 8 miles southwest of Buras, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Boothville-venice, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Buras-triumph, Venice and Boothville Asos. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
